languages.text: {n}Владайм мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "Подавится Октавиана. Меня пока рано списывать со счетов. Но я ценю, что Ваша Светлость сочли нужным меня проинформировать. Я буду приглядывать за этой не в меру бойкой барменшей".

{n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "Подавится Октавиана. Меня пока рано списывать со счетов. Но я ценю, что Ваша Светлость сочли нужным меня проинформировать. Я буду приглядывать за этой не в меру бойкой барменшей".

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“那个奥克塔维娜恐怕是贪多嚼不烂。现在就打算把我踢出去，恐怕还为时过早。不过，我很感激大人您愿意告诉我这件事情，我会好好盯着那个吵闹的酒保。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“那个奥克塔维娜恐怕是要贪多嚼不烂了。现在就打算把我踢出去，恐怕还为时过早。不过，我很感激大人您愿意告诉我这件事情，我会好好盯着那个贪心不足的酒保。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは暗く笑う。{/n}「オクタヴィアナは、自分の能力だけでは解決出来ないようだ。まだ私を見限るのは早すぎる。でも、知らせてくれた陛下の決断には感謝していますよ。あの気性の荒いバーテンダーは、監視しておきましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは暗く笑う。{/n}「オクタヴィアナは、自分の能力だけでは解決出来ないようだ。まだ私を見限るのは早すぎる。でも、知らせてくれた陛下の決断には感謝していますよ。あの気性の荒いバーテンダーは、監視しておきましょう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sonríe de manera sombría.{/n} «Así que Octaviana ha mordido más de lo que puede masticar. Aún es pronto para darme por perdido, pero agradezco la decisión de mi{mf|lord|lady} de informarme. No le quitaré ojo».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sonríe de manera sombría.{/n} «Así que Octaviana ha mordido más de lo que puede masticar. Aún es pronto para darme por perdido, pero agradezco la decisión de mi{mf|lord|lady} de informarme. No le quitaré ojo».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym grinst düster.{/n} "Dann hat Octaviana sich übernommen. Es ist zu früh, um mich schon abzuschreiben. Aber ich danke Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft für die Entscheidung, mich zu informieren. Ich werde die übermäßig couragierte Barkeeperin im Auge behalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym grinst düster.{/n} "Dann hat Octaviana sich übernommen. Es ist zu früh, um mich schon abzuschreiben. Aber ich danke Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft für die Entscheidung, mich zu informieren. Ich werde die übermäßig agile Barkeeperin im Auge behalten."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym affiche un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Si c'est le cas, elle a les yeux plus gros que le ventre. Il est encore un peu tôt pour m'effacer du tableau. Mais merci de m'en avoir informé, Votre Seigneurie. Je garderai notre chère tenancière à l'œil. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym affiche un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Si c'est le cas, elle a les yeux plus gros que le ventre. Il est encore un peu tôt pour m'effacer du tableau. Mais merci de m'en avoir informé, Votre Seigneurie. Je garderai notre chère tenancière à l'œil. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın yüzünde tehditkâr bir sırıtış beliriyor.{/n} "Octaviana bu defa boyundan büyük işe kalkışmış. Daha güçten düşmedik. Lakin zatıaliniz, bu bilgiyi bana bahşederek minnetimi kazandınız. Bir gözüm o hırçın meyhanecide olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grins darkly.{/n} "Then Octaviana's bitten off more than she can chew. It's too early to write me off yet. But I appreciate Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's decision to inform me. I'll keep an eye on that overly feisty bartender."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
